Counting the number of letters when we write out a sequence of numbers. As:
1, 2 is written as one, two - a total of 6 letters. We ignore whitespaces and
hyphens.

Using the library `english`

```{r eval = TRUE}
library(english)
english(999)
```



```{r}
all_numbers_as_words <- english(1:1000)
```

Collapse that to a single string:

```{r}
one_single_string <- paste0(all_numbers_as_words, collapse = "")
```

Remove whitespace:

```{r}
without_ws <- gsub(" ", "", one_single_string)
```

Remove hyphens:

```{r}
without_hyphens <- gsub("-", "", without_ws)
```

Count characters:

```{r}
answers <- nchar(without_hyphens)
```
